channel.title: (508) i can connect but others cant! help!(508)
channel.description: Well.. its my first time running 508s and i heard that version 6 update 7 of java doesnt work on them? but my mate helpedme anyway and i got it up and running. but... no one else can ocnnect it shows them trying on the cmd but errors for them.. any help appreciated? :( :rolleyes: thanks
